issue.title: [CF 95] Fingers of Frost stacks not showing
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Just get 2 stacks of Fingers of Frost :P like with the talented pet freeze

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
I don't see any stacks and I'd like to see 2 when I have them.

What version of the product are you using?
Uhm, the latest :)

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No


> Posted by CurseForge user Enquillion | Imported from CurseForge issue #95 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: TellMeWhen.lua

TellMeWhen.lua


> Posted by CurseForge user Enquillion

Go into the Blizz interface options panel > addons tab > TellMeWhen > Font

and change the font outline. There may be some overlapping because you have your icons so small; I may add sliders to set the offset of the text.

Also, thank you, because you made me notice a really dumb mistake I made that was causing this problem for you.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks! There are no problems with overlapping.


> Posted by CurseForge user Enquillion
